   John Williams 
 (I) 
Music Department   | 
Soundtrack   | 
Composer 
As one of the best known, awarded, and financially successful composers in US history, John Williams is as easy to recall as  John Philip Sousa ,  Aaron Copland  or  Leonard Bernstein , illustrating why he is "America's composer" time and again. With a massive list of awards that includes over 41 Oscar nominations (five wins), twenty-odd Gold and ...
